tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    comment_date TIMESTAMP,
    comment_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    post_id INT NOT NULL,
    content TEXT NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
  comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  post_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  comment_content TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE feed (
  feed_item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  item_type TEXT,
  item_id INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
);
